summary.overview: The Online Quiz Portal allows users to participate in a quiz by answering multiple-choice questions. Users can navigate through questions, select answers, and view their final score at the end of the quiz.
summary.external_resources: No external resources are explicitly mentioned in the provided code.
summary.external_js_libraries: No external JavaScript libraries are explicitly mentioned in the provided code.

description.context: When the user accesses the Online Quiz Portal.
description.user_action: The user views the initial page.
description.system_response: The system displays the title 'Online Quiz Portal' and the first question with its options.

description.context: When the user views a question.
description.user_action: The user reads the question displayed in the <h2> element with ID 'question'.
description.system_response: The system displays the text of the current question.

description.context: When the user views answer options for a question.
description.user_action: The user sees multiple answer options displayed as radio buttons within the <div> element with ID 'options'.
description.system_response: The system dynamically generates and displays radio buttons for each answer option.

description.context: When the user selects an answer option.
description.user_action: The user clicks on a radio button to select an answer.
description.system_response: The system marks the selected radio button as checked.

description.context: When the user clicks the 'Next Question' button.
description.user_action: The user clicks the <button> element with ID 'next-button'.
description.system_response: The system calculates the score for the current question, updates the question index, and loads the next question if available.

description.context: When the user completes all questions.
description.user_action: The user clicks the 'Next Question' button after answering the last question.
description.system_response: The system hides the question, options, and button elements, and displays the final score in the <div> element with ID 'score'.

description.context: When the user views their final score.
description.user_action: The user sees the score displayed in the <div> element with ID 'score'.
description.system_response: The system displays the text 'You scored X out of Y', where X is the user's score and Y is the total number of questions.
